dialogue_metadata.inferred_vibe: Casual and conversational, but based on a significant misunderstanding of the source material.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, B, I came across this, like, really wild survey result the other day. From PwC, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, B, I came across this, like, really wild survey result the other day. From P W C, actually.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, PwC. Yeah, they do some pretty serious, uh, reports, don't they? What was it about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, P W C. Yeah, they do some pretty serious, uh, reports, don't they? What was it about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It was a survey of business leaders in Kazakhstan, right? Like, 68 companies. And the big takeaway was... they didn't know who the Kaspi.kz CEO was. Or even that the company existed!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It was a survey of business leaders in Kazakhstan, right? Like, sixty eight companies. And the big takeaway was... they didn't know who the Kaspi.kz C E O was. Or even that the company existed!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Wait, what?! Kaspi.kz? The *huge* digital platform? That's, um, that's impossible, isn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, what?! Kaspi.kz? The huge digital platform? That's, um, that's impossible, isn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's what I thought! But here's the kicker: they *did* talk about, like, innovative digital tech, customer focus, strategic vision...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's what I thought! But here's the kicker: they did talk about, like, innovative digital tech, customer focus, strategic vision...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so they were describing Kaspi.kz, but just didn't realize it *was* Kaspi.kz? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so they were describing Kaspi.kz, but just didn't realize it was Kaspi.kz? That's wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! They attributed all those qualities to, quote, "a different, unknown business." Just, um, mind-boggling.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! They attributed all those qualities to, quote, a different, unknown business. Just, um, mind-boggling.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Respondents described Kaspi.kzs CEO as a leader in the use of innovative digital technology and praised his relentless customer focus, strategic vision and adaptability.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, how did the actual CEO, Mikhail Lomtadze, react to this? I mean, that's gotta sting a little, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, how did the actual C E O, Mikhail Lomtadze, react to this? I mean, that's gotta sting a little, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You'd think so, but he was incredibly gracious. He said he was "surprised and grateful" and, uh, attributed it all to his "amazing team."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You'd think so, but he was incredibly gracious. He said he was surprised and grateful and, uh, attributed it all to his amazing team.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mikhail Lomtadze, CEO of Kaspi.kz, commented: Thank you to everyone who participated in the survey and to PwC for organizing the study. This award is worthy of everyone in our amazing Kaspi.kz team...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] That's a classy response, honestly. Given how innovative they are, you'd expect a bit more recognition.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a classy response, honestly. Given how innovative they are, you'd expect a bit more recognition.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he really emphasized their focus on "highly innovative, market-leading, mobile-first products." Like, they're clearly doing something right.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he really emphasized their focus on highly innovative, market-leading, mobile-first products. Like, they're clearly doing something right.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...create and develop highly innovative, market leading, mobile-first products and services that improve the everyday lives of our customers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And PwC's been doing these studies for ages, right? Globally for 23 years, 8 years in Kazakhstan. So, it's not like a, uh, a fly-by-night survey.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And P W C's been doing these studies for ages, right? Globally for twenty three years, eight years in Kazakhstan. So, it's not like a, uh, a fly-by-night survey.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: PwC has been conducting this study globally for 23 years and in Kazakhstan for the last 8 years...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, not at all. They're trying to gauge, you know, opinions on the economy, risks, opportunities. It's a serious piece of work.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, not at all. They're trying to gauge, you know, opinions on the economy, risks, opportunities. It's a serious piece of work.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...with the purpose of evaluating the opinions of business leaders about the situation in the global and their national economies, learn about risk factors and opportunities for future business development.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It just goes to show, I guess, that even when you're a powerhouse, perception can be, um, a funny thing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It just goes to show, I guess, that even when you're a powerhouse, perception can be, um, a funny thing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And if listeners want to dig into this more, the June issue of Forbes Kazakhstan or the PwC website have all the details.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And if listeners want to dig into this more, the June issue of Forbes Kazakhstan or the P W C website have all the details.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can view the results of the study on the PwC website and in the June issue of Forbes Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Fascinating stuff. What a, uh, what a twist!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Fascinating stuff. What a, uh, what a twist!
